title: Squad
notes: Launcher splash screen appears, but the game itself only shows a black window briefly before closing. Game can work in regular wine, but cannot connect to any EAC-secure servers (which is most, if not all of the servers for the game)

title: Squad
notes: Initial load screen shows, briefly a black window and then crashes.

gpu: X.Org AMD Radeon (TM) RX 480 Graphics (POLARIS10, DRM 3.26.0, 4.18.14-arch1-1-ARCH, LLVM 8.0.0)
notes:
Game itself works fine, only needs xaudio2_7 (native, builtin) override to fix audio glitches.
But the server browser does not work (endless loading screen) which makes online play impossible.
